name: SMAF associates Law Firm
overview: The Law firm acts for a wide variety of clients involved in Italian financial services and also handles contentious financial matters for many other foreign commercial clients. The law firm is drawn from chartered accountants and experts, all with specialist knowledge of various aspects of the Italian financial services industry giving the law firm depth of knowledge and the ability to deal with any financial litigation, relating to securities, commodity, trade finance or regulatory issues. Our experience Lawyers in the firm have an understanding of national and international markets and experience dealing with all aspects of contentious financial matters, including, overall, litigation, arbitration, disciplinary hearings, class-actions and investigatory, disciplinary or enforcement action by regulators.
